Name: SAVAGE
About the game: This is an adventure game in the wild. You can feel various weather changes and the alternation of day and night in this super large wild scene. You will encounter herbivores such as goats, rabbits, deers and so on. You can also fight with lions, tigers and other beasts with bare hands or with the weapons such as wooden sticks, bows and arrows.
Meta Title: SAVAGE: Dec 21, 2020, Lightning Cop and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on SAVAGE? Check out the release date (Dec 21, 2020), developer insights from Lightning Cop, and a complete game summary.
